jobs.title: test123
jobs.description: We are looking for a motivated individual to join our growing team. The ideal candidate will have strong analytical skills and be able to work independently as well as part of a team. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in relevant field, 2-3 years of relevant experience, Strong communication skills, Proficiency in MS Office. Responsibilities: Conduct testing and analysis, Prepare detailed reports, Collaborate with team members, Maintain quality standards.
jobs.keySkills: Analytical skills, MS Office, Communication, Testing

jobs.title: Functional & Automation Tester
jobs.description: Strong VisionPlus Experience Expert in at least 1 of the Modules like CMS, FAS Strong Communication skills. Good in working both as independent contributor or team member. Should have Technical and Functional design. Experience in one of the VisionPLUS modules - CMS, FAS, MBS, ASM, CTA, CDM, WSS/SSCSshould be able to prepare Technical Specification, Functional Specification and High Level Design documents independently. Should have good understanding of Cards Domain, Payment gateway. Should have detailed technical understanding of V+ Batch and Online Architecture, VisionPLUS Functional Architecture and Mandatory Parameter configurations. Should be able to create VisionPLUS test data for Unit Testing, Integration Testing and SIT. Should support SIT/UAT team on defect resolution and should participate in Defect review meetings. Should be able to prepare Integration test Plans independently. Should be able to configure a VisionPlus module independently for integration testing. Requirements: Experience in one of the VisionPLUS modules - CMS, FAS, MBS, ASM, CTA, CDM, WSS/SSOShould be able to prepare Technical Specification, Functional Specification and High Level Design documents independently, Should have good understanding of Cards Domain, Payment gateway, Should have detailed technical understanding of V+ Batch and Online Architecture, VisionPLUS Functional Architecture and Mandatory Parameter configurations, Should be able to create VisionPLUS test data for Unit Testing, Integration Testing and SIT, Should support SIT/UAT team on defect resolution and should participate in Defect review meetings, Should be able to prepare Integration test Plans independently.Should be able to configure a VisionPlus module independently for integration testing. Responsibilities: .
jobs.keySkills: Artificial Intelligence, Underwriting, Consulting, Integration testing, CMS Unit testing, High level design, Vision Plus Financial services Testing

jobs.title: Assistant Manager, Digital Platform Operations
jobs.description: We are seeking an Assistant Manager to oversee digital platform operations and ensure smooth delivery of services to our clients. Requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science or related field, 3-5 years of experience in digital platform management, Strong leadership and communication skills, Experience with agile methodologies. Responsibilities: Manage digital platform operations, Coordinate with development teams, Ensure quality delivery of services, Monitor platform performance.
jobs.keySkills: Digital platform management, Leadership, Agile methodologies, Communication

jobs.title: React Front End Developer
jobs.description: We are looking for a skilled React Front End Developer to join our development team and build amazing user experiences. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field, 2-4 years of experience with React.js, Strong knowledge of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Experience with modern front-end tools. Responsibilities: Develop user interface components using React.js, Build reusable components and libraries, Optimize applications for maximum speed and scalability, Collaborate with back-end developers and designers.

education.ug: BSc in Computer Science or related field

jobs.keySkills: React.js, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Front-end tools

jobs.title: Telecom Sales Executive
jobs.description: Join our sales team as a Telecom Sales Executive and help drive business growth through effective client relationships. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business or related field, 1-3 years of sales experience, Excellent communication and negotiation skills, Knowledge of telecom industry preferred. Responsibilities: Generate new business opportunities, Maintain existing client relationships, Meet monthly sales targets, Prepare sales reports and presentations.

education.ug: BSc in Business or related field

jobs.title: Product Specialist – Technical
jobs.description: We are seeking a technical product specialist to support our product development and customer success initiatives. Requirements: Bachelor's degree in Engineering or related field, 3-5 years of technical product experience, Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, Customer-facing experience preferred. Responsibilities: Provide technical support for products, Work with engineering teams on product development, Support customer implementations, Create technical documentation.

education.ug: BSc in Engineering or related field

jobs.keySkills: Technical support, Product development, Analytical skills, Problem-solving
